question:
####UFAQ [Damon Stone]
If the Runner trashes more than one Corp card at the same time, such as with [Apocalypse](/en/card/09030), how many traces does Controlling the Message initiate?
answer:
One.

If the Runner plays [Apocalypse](/en/card/09030) and [Aryabhata Tech](/en/card/10070) Tech trigger?
>No. Controlling the Message triggers off of the Runner trashing the installed Corp cards, and only abilities on active cards can trigger.
